publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3292 Irene McGugan: Under 18 Scottish Men's Hockey Team Successâ€”That the Parliament notes that, despite several setbacks and injuries, the Under 18 Scottish Men's Hockey Team competed in the 1st European Nations Cup Under 18 Boys B Division tournament in Olten, Switzerland between 1 and 6 July 2002; congratulates the team on winning its group by beating Wales and drawing with Russia and on subsequently beating both Italy and the host nation to win the gold medal and, with it, promotion to the A division; further congratulates the team on this significant and well-deserved sporting success, and commiserates with the English team on its relegation from the A division to the B division.
S1M-3292 Under 18 Scottish Men's Hockey Team Success (lodged on 26 July 2002) Michael Matheson*
S1M-3292 Under 18 Scottish Men's Hockey Team Success (lodged on 26 July 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3292 Under 18 Scottish Men's Hockey Team Success (lodged on 26 July 2002) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
